long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Playlist Length Calculator is a simple and convenient Chrome extension that helps you instantly calculate the total duration of any YouTube playlist. Whether you're planning a binge-watch session, managing study material, or just curious about how long a playlist will take to complete, this extension provides you with the exact total runtime in hours, minutes, and seconds.

Key Features:
⚫ Instantly calculates the total duration of any YouTube playlist.
⚫User-friendly and lightweight extension.
⚫Perfect for students, content creators, and YouTube enthusiasts.
⚫Saves time by eliminating the need to manually sum up video lengths.

With just a few clicks, you can find out how much time your favorite playlists will take—making your YouTube experience even better!
